mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (pin_id, member_id, top_level_comment_id, level, content, parent_nickname) values (#{pinId}, #{memberId}, #{topLevelCommentId}, #{level}, #{content}, #{parentNickname})
mapper.select: SELECT comment_id, comment.pin_id, member.nickname, top_level_comment_id, level, content, created_at, updated_at, parent_nickname FROM comment INNER JOIN member ON comment.member_id = member.member_id WHERE comment.pin_id = #{pinId} and comment.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY comment_id ASC, level ASC
